argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngidm.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rngidm.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | rngidm.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_ringidmlem | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( .1. .x. X ) = X /\ ( X .x. .1. ) = X ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( .1. .x. X ) = X ) |
